snippet: The deaths of the young people, who were passengers in a car that plunged off a dead-end road and into a creek, seemed to touch everyone in a pocket of East Elmhurst.
abstract: Deaths of Jada Monique Butts, Darius Fletcher, Jaleel Furtado, and Crystal Gravely, all passengers in car that plunged off dead-end road and into Steinway Creek in East Elmhurst, Queens, seems to touch everyone in neighborhood; only the driver, Andrew Gramm, escaped as the car sank; four young friends have been mourned, in public vigil, private prayers and on banks of the creek where crash occurred on dark rainy night.

byline.original: By KIA GREGORY and ANNIE CORREAL
byline.contributor: J. David Goodman and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The deaths of the young people, who were passengers in a car that plunged off a dead-end road and into a creek, seemed to touch everyone in a pocket of East Elmhurst.

headline.main: Queens Community Mourns 4 Friends Killed in Crash
headline.print_headline: Queens Community Mourns 4 Friends Killed in Crash
